title: Zombie Road VIII: Crossroads of Chaos
description: His hands knew how to fight. His fingers knew the ways of war.Gunny, Griz and the crew have one more mission south of the border, the Traveler is looking to right some wrongs and Jessie is trapped in a faraway place. The undead hordes are as vicious as ever and a simple rescue mission gets real complicated real quick.An orphaned girl, a community on an island, a hunt for a goat and the Mona Lisa help the jaded Traveler find his place in a world that isnâ€™t his.While Jessie waits for Scarlet to heal, his mysterious protector may be more human than anyone thought.This is the final two-fisted, gas guzzling, gear grinding thrill ride of the Zombie Road saga. More tales to come but this concludes the story that started with the Convoy of Carnage.Scroll up and grab your copy today!
author: David A. Simpson
